items.sentence: This is the road that I was telling you about.
I didn't like the dress that Mary was wearing.
Tom texted Mary to tell her that he was sorry.
I know that this must be really scary for you.
Do I need to wear a helmet when driving a car?
I heard Tom and Mary would be going to Boston.
Tom came back from the store without anything.
Did you really think that I wouldn't tell Tom?
The plan will be brought into effect tomorrow.
The meeting was adjourned until the next week.
